alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Mariposa Madera Foothills; Mariposa-Madera Lower Sierra; San Joaquin River Canyon; Upper San Joaquin River (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 6:54PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Madera and north central Fresno Counties through 630 PM PST... At 554 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Yosemite Lakes, or 22 miles south of Yosemite South Entrance, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Yosemite Lakes, Nature Point, Peckinpah, Bass Lake, Crane Valley Reservoir, Minarets and North Fork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
